name: R5-Substance-R4-Substance
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Substance into FHIR R4

element.display: A homogeneous material with a definite composition

target.display: A homogeneous material with a definite composition
target.comment: R5 `Substance` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance`

element.display: What class/type of substance this is

target.display: What class/type of substance this is
target.comment: R5 `Substance.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.category`
R5 `Substance.code` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Substance.code` - code has change due to type change: R5 code CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 code
R5 `Substance.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.contained`

element.display: Textual description of the substance, comments

target.display: Textual description of the substance, comments
target.comment: R5 `Substance.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Substance.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 description

element.display: When no longer valid to use

target.comment: R5 `Substance.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Substance.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Substance.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.id`
R5 `Substance.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Substance.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.implicitRules`
R5 `Substance.ingredient` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.ingredient`

R5 `Substance.ingredient.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Substance.ingredient.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Substance.ingredient.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.ingredient.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Substance.ingredient.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Substance.ingredient.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `Substance.ingredient.quantity` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Substance.ingredient.quantity` - quantity has change due to type change: R5 `quantity` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `quantity`
R5 `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]`

element.display: Is this an instance of a substance or a kind of one

target.display: If this describes a specific package/container of the substance
target.comment: R5 `Substance.instance` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Substance.instance` - instance changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); instance has change due to type change: R5 instance boolean has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 instance
R5 `Substance.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Substance.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `Substance.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.meta`

R5 `Substance.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Substance.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Amount of substance in the package

target.comment: R5 `Substance.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/substance-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/substance-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Substance.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Substance.text`
